branchCategory.name: CVRA1-Z
branchCategory.description: <P>The CVRA1_Z series is a rack and pinion style rotary actuator with solenoid valve. Available bore sizes include 50, 63, 80 and 100mm. There are five shaft styles to choose from. Other options include angle adjusting unit, with or without cushion, and auto switch capability. </P>

branchItem.name: C(D)VRA1-Z, Rotary Actuator w/Solenoid Valve
branchItem.description: <P>The CVRA1_Z series is a rack and pinion style rotary actuator with solenoid valve. Available bore sizes include 50, 63, 80 and 100mm. There are five shaft styles to choose from. Other options include angle adjusting unit, with or without cushion, and auto switch capability. </P>
